meaning: You are a star in the sky of my life.
My heart beats with your name.
I can't imagine my life without you.

phrase: مَاذَا فَعَلْتِ لِي؟ كُلُّ مَا أَرَاهُ هُوَ حُبُّكِ.
meaning: What have you done to me? All I see is your love.
When I look at you, I see the future.
You are my favorite song.

phrase: تَخَيَّلْتُ أَنَّنِي سَأَقَعُ فِي الْحُبِّ، لَكِنْ لَمْ أَتَخَيَّلْ أَنْ يَكُونَ مَعَكِ.
meaning: I imagined that I would fall in love, but I never thought it would be with you.
Every moment with you is eternal.
I live for your smile.

phrase: أُحِبُّكِ أَكْثَرَ مِمَّا يُمْكِنُ أَنْ أَصِفَ.
meaning: I love you more than I can describe.

phrase: لَمْ أَكُنْ أَعْلَمُ أَنَّ الْحُبَّ يُمْكِنُ أَنْ يَكُونَ بِهَذَا الْجَمَالِ.
meaning: I didn't know love could be this beautiful.
You are a legend from the tales of my heart.
Your voice is the music of my heart.

phrase: لَا أُرِيدُ شَيْئًا أَكْثَرَ مِنْ رُؤْيَتِكِ سَعِيدَةً.
meaning: I want nothing more than to see you happy.

phrase: لَقَدْ عَثَرْتُ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ كُنْتُ أَبْحَثُ عَنْهُ فِي كِ.
meaning: I found everything I was looking for in you.
You are the love I have always waited for.
I miss you even in my dreams.
Your presence makes everything possible.
You are the dawn that lights up my night.
Every time I see you, my love grows.
I love you as much as I love life.
How can I live without you?
I love the moments we share together.

phrase: أَنتِ أَفْضَلُ صَدِيقَةٍ لِي، وَعَاشِقَتِي أَيْضًا.
meaning: You are my best friend and my lover.
Every time I sip my coffee, I remember your laughter.
You are my dream that has come true.

phrase: لَنْ أَنْسَى تِلْكَ اللَّيْلَةَ الَّتِي قَضَيْنَاهَا تَحْتَ النُّجُومِ.
meaning: I will never forget that night we spent under the stars.

phrase: كُلَّمَا أَرَاكِ، أَشْعُرُ أَنَّنِي فِي الْجَنَّةِ.
meaning: Every time I see you, I feel like I’m in paradise.
You are the beautiful melody of my heart.

phrase: أُحِبُّ مَشَاوِيرَنَا مَعًا، حَتَّى لَوْ كَانَتْ بَسِيطَةً.
meaning: I love our outings together, even if they are simple.

phrase: أُحِبُّكِ فِي كُلِّ لَحْظَةٍ، حَتَّى فِي صَمْتِنَا.
meaning: I love you in every moment, even in our silence.
Your presence makes everything better.
You are my strength on difficult days.

phrase: أُحِبُّ كَيْفَ أَنَّكِ تَفْهَمِينَنِي بِدُونِ أَنْ أَتَكَلَّمَ.
meaning: I love how you understand me without me having to speak.
I am lucky to have you.

phrase: لَا يُوجَدُ شَيْءٌ أَجْمَلُ مِنَ الْعَوْدَةِ إِلَى الْمَنْزِلِ إِلَيْكِ.
meaning: There is nothing more beautiful than coming home to you.

phrase: مَعَكِ أَشْعُرُ أَنَّ الْحَيَاةَ مَثَلُ فَنٍّ.
meaning: With you, life feels like a work of art.
You are a flower in the garden of my heart.
With you, I feel like I carry happiness.

phrase: أُحِبُّكِ فِي كُلِّ شَيْءٍ، فِي الْعَصْرِ وَفِي اللَّيْلِ.
meaning: I love you in everything, in the afternoon and in the night.
I adore your details.

phrase: أَنتِ الحُبُّ الَّذِي يُثْبِتُ أَنَّنِي مَحْظُوظٌ.
meaning: You are the love that proves I am lucky.

phrase: مَا أَجْمَلَ رَائِحَتَكِ، كَأنَّها أَرْوَاحُ الأَزْهَارِ.
meaning: How beautiful your scent is, like the essence of flowers.

phrase: أَحْلَى حَضْنٍ أَجِدُهُ فِي عَالَمِي هُوَ حَضْنُكِ.
meaning: The sweetest embrace I find in my world is your embrace.
The sweetest memories are made with you.

phrase: أَنتِ النَّحْلَةُ الَّتِي تُعْطِينِي شَهَدَ حَيَاتِي.
meaning: You are the bee that gives me the honey of my life.

phrase: حَبُّكِ هُوَ النُّورُ الَّذِي يُنِيرُ دَرَبِي.
meaning: Your love is the light that illuminates my path.

phrase: لَوْ كَانَتِ الْحُبُّ مَزِيدًا مِنَ الأَحْلَامِ، لَكُنْتِ أَحْلَى حَلْمٍ أَحْلَامَتُهُ.
meaning: If love were more than dreams, you would be the sweetest dream I dreamed.
I love you as the seas love the waves.
You are the flower of my heart and my love.

phrase: مَعَكِ أَحِسُّ أَنَّني أَفْهَمُ حَقِيقَةَ السَّعَادَةِ.
meaning: With you, I feel I understand the truth of happiness.
With you, the streets of my time sleep.

phrase: تُشْعِلِينَ نَارَ شَوْقِي فِي كُلِّ مَكَانٍ.
meaning: You ignite the fire of my longing everywhere.

phrase: أَنْتِ الْعَطَاءُ الَّذِي يُسَتَحَقُّ أَنْ يُحْفَظَ.
meaning: You are the gift that deserves to be cherished.

phrase: كُلَّمَا دَقَّتِ السَّاعَةُ، أُحِسُّ أَنَّ الْحُبَّ أَخْذُ مَكَانَهُ.
meaning: Every time the clock ticks, I feel love taking its place.

phrase: مَعَكِ، أَشْعُرُ أَنَّ الْعَالَمَ خَالٍ مِنَ الْهَمِّ.
meaning: With you, I feel the world is free from worries.
I love the thoughts that swirl with you.

phrase: أَنْتِ الرِّيحَةُ الَّتِي تَعُودُ مَعَ الْمَسَاءِ.
meaning: You are the breeze that returns with the evening.
I love what you carry in your heart.
You are the tune that gathers my paths.
How I long for the glances of your eyes.
You are the light that brightens my heart.
With you, I feel life renews.
I miss you every evening.
You are the love that deserves devotion.

phrase: أَحْلَى كَلِمَةٍ أَفْوَّهُ بِهَا هِيَ: أُحِبُّكِ.
meaning: The sweetest word I utter is: I love you.

phrase: أُحِبُّ ذَلِكَ الْخَطُّ الَّذِي كَتَبَتْهُ قَلْبِي.
meaning: I love that line written by my heart.
I find no one but you to connect me with them.
I love the way you look at me.
I miss the moments we gather.

phrase: أُحِبُّ أَنْ تَكُونِي قُرْبِي كُلَّ حِينٍ.
meaning: I love having you close to me all the time.

phrase: أَحْلَى مَا فِي حَيَاتِي هُوَ حُبُّكِ.
meaning: The sweetest thing in my life is your love.

phrase: أَنتِ الْعَالَمُ الَّذِي أَرِيدُ أَنْ أَسْتَكْشِفَهُ.
meaning: You are the world I want to explore.
With you, the days are sweeter.
I love you as the nights love the stars.
You are the pearl in the sea of my life.

phrase: مَعَكِ أُحِسُّ أَنَّ الدُّنْيَا تَسْتَعِدُّ لِلزَّهْرِ.
meaning: With you, the world seems ready to bloom.
You are the song of my heart.
I love your way of dealing with me.
With you, life is a masterpiece.
I love to hear your voice.

phrase: أَنتِ الحُبُّ الَّذِي يَجْعَلُ الأَيَّامَ جَمِيلَةً.
meaning: You are the love that makes the days beautiful.
The sweetest things that unite us.
With you, I feel that I love life.
I love the nights we spend together.

phrase: أَنتِ الرَّاحَةُ الَّتِي أَجِدُهَا فِي دَاخِلِي.
meaning: You are the comfort I find within me.
With you, the moments are sweeter.
I love your way of nourishing.
You are my heart that beats with love.
With you, I feel the evening is sweeter.

phrase: أَنتِ الحُبُّ الَّذِي يُشْعِلُ فِيَّ الشَّغَفَ.
meaning: You are the love that ignites passion in me.

phrase: مَعَكِ، أَشْعُرُ أَنَّ الْحَيَاةَ مَثَلُ وَسَامٍ.
meaning: With you, life feels like a noble art.

phrase: أُحِبُّ لَوْنَ الشَّمْسِ الَّذِي يُشْعِلُهُ حُبُّكِ.
meaning: I love the color of the sun that your love ignites.

phrase: أَنتِ العَلَمُ الَّذِي يُشِيرُ إِلَى الأَحْلَامِ.
meaning: You are the flag that points to dreams.
With you, time celebrates safety.
I love you as water loves plants.
You are the star that lights up my heart.
With you, light shines within me.
I love the days when you are around.
You are the good I wish for.
With you, hopes are washed with joys.

phrase: أُحِبُّ صَوْتَكَ كَصَوْتِ الْمَاءِ فِي النَّبِيذِ.
meaning: I love your voice like the sound of water in the wine.
You are the poem I dream of.
With you, I feel life is wonderful.
I love the speeches that talk about you.
You are the wish I dream of.
With you, the days are sweeter.
I love you as the sun loves the horizon.

phrase: أَنتِ الكَلِمَةُ الَّتِي أُرِيدُ أَنْ أَكْتُبَهَا.
meaning: You are the word I want to write.
With you, I feel happiness renews.
I love your way of progressing in life.
You are the beauty that resides within me.
With you, the days ignite feelings.
I love what you mean to me.

phrase: أَنتِ الحُبُّ الَّذِي يُنَمِّي فِيَّ السَّعَادَةَ.
meaning: You are the love that nurtures happiness in me.
With you, I feel beauty blossoms.

phrase: أُحِبُّ قَلْبَكِ الَّذِي يَحْتَوي عَلَى المَشَاعِرِ.
meaning: I love your heart that contains feelings.
You are the inspiration I need.
With you, the days fill me with happiness.
I love the plants that bloom with you.
You are the refuge I find.
With you, the morning shines on me.
I love the love you carry.
You are the pulse that revives my heart.
With you, the days are filled with colors.
I love the sky that carries your love.

phrase: أَنتِ الأُمنِيَّةُ الَّتِي تَسْتَحِقُّ أَنْ تُحَقَّقَ.
meaning: You are the wish that deserves to be fulfilled.
With you, I feel that life is complete.
I love the heart that loves you.
You are the song I dream of.
With you, I feel that comfort embraces me.
I love the passion you carry.
You are the beauty that carries me.
With you, the days unite me with joy.
I love the time I spend with you.
You are the gentle one who hides my love.

phrase: مَعَكِ، أُحِسُّ أَنَّ الْحَيَاةَ مِلْؤُهَا الفَرَحَ.
meaning: With you, I feel that life is full of joy.
I love the time I spend with you.
You are the love that nourishes colors.
With you, the days are more beautiful.

phrase: أُحِبُّ الْمَرَاتِ الَّتِي نَحْتَفِي بِهَا مَعًا.
meaning: I love the times we celebrate together.
You are the light that illuminates my path.
With you, warmth ignites in my heart.
I love the colors that unite with you.
You are the memory that unites me.
With you, I feel that life is a sharing.

phrase: أُحِبُّ الأوقاتَ الَّتِي نَشْعُرُ فِيهَا سَوِيًّا.
meaning: I love the moments we feel together.
You are the magic that elevates me.
With you, the days fill me with happiness.
I love the heart that loves you.
You are the memory I dream of.
With you, the days carry colors.
I love the moments we spend together.
You are the wish I dream of.
With you, the days ignite colors.
